messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near White Father's Relay 23, please stand-by.
